alert.note: Alert for Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 4:55PM EDT until August 20 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 455 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cairo, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Whigham, Akridge, Peoples Still, Spence, Capel, Elpino and Harrells Still. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
